mapper.select: SELECT id,title,content,user_id,forum_id,create_time, is_top FROM blog WHERE forum_id = #{id} ORDER BY create_time
SELECT id, title, content, user_id, forum_id, create_time, is_top FROM blog ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, u.user_name, b.forum_id, f.name forum_name, b.create_time, b.is_top FROM blog b LEFT JOIN forum f ON b.forum_id = f.id LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
